if(current.instance_id == curHubInstanceId) { GlidePropertiesDB.set('glide.apps.hub.current',''); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2014-03-05 19:31:37</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>3296f451d713110050f5edcb9e6103d0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Clear Current Hub After Delete</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="System Update Sets (with remote update set support)" source="com.glide.system_update_set">44f3bce43c31311068bcf327dfe37f6b</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_3296f451d713110050f5edcb9e6103d0</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2014-03-05 19:31:37</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3296f451d713110050f5edcb9e6103d0"/> </record_update>
